          You are the protagonist of an unfinished 1st person  fantasy  game,
          trapped  in  development  hell.  The  designers    (played  byJames
          Urbaniak,Ashly  Burch,  andKaren  Dyer)  are  god-like,    but   so
          indecisive that they've given you no powers  whatsoever.  With  the
          help of a mysterious disembodied voice (Stephen Russell)  you  must
          seize the tools of game  development from  these  unworthy  'gods',
          uncovering more of the darkly comic story as you go.
     
          For more infos go to : http://store.steampowered.com/app/323380/
